fibonacci.title: Fibonacci Calculator
fibonacci.fibonacciDescription: n mathematics, the Fibonacci numbers, commonly denoted Fâ‚™, form a sequence, the Fibonacci sequence, in which each number is the sum of the two preceding ones. The sequence commonly starts from 0 and 1, although some authors omit the initial terms and start the sequence from 1 and 1 or from 1 and 2.
